TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted. you find dying.

I wish to explode the moon and not be crushed by debris

Granted. The debris rains down on the earth killing millions and destroying all civilization as you know it. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re subsequently killed for a chocolate bar by the starving lawless masses.

I wish for world peace so we can all focus on science

Granted. But a large annual blight occurs all over the world, and most people are focused on food science instead of space science.

I wish for Capt'n Skunky.

Granted. Unfortunately he hates you for it, because wishmaking fairy was quite hars when granting your wish.

I want to be "zee captain" from "romantically apocalyptic".

Granted, but he is trying to destroy you !

I wish for a Green Iron Crown (with negative rep).

Granted, but it's actually made of copper. Green is copper rust.

I wish for copper to be added to [generic space game].

Granted. The generic space is now all solid copper.

I wish that I could plug anything or anybody to a computer and edit its/their source code (In java, for terminal I prefer bash with apt as default )

Granted but everybody can plug you to a computer and hack your source code as well.

I wish I knew the password.

Granted. You forgot the username.

I wish for the BlackBerry passport.

it explodes

I wish for the ability to explode Russians and have no one find out about it and not be killed in the blast and for it to have infinite charges. also useable to control china's population.

Granted. Chinese people spontaneously generate from the Russian explosions.

I wish for an ax, not spelled with an E.

You get a ox that xoxoxox you.

I wish for a bold B.

Granted, but Bold now means Italic now. B

I wish Red Zone wouldn't stay stuck in my head.

Granted, but for it to be removed we decided to just remove the brain.

I wish this wish will be corrupted.

granted, Error code: 404

I wish that there is no error code: 404

granted you got a +-1 so it's now 405 or 403

I wish for the now internet and some cold fire wall in the wild ...

what?

I wish to understand that wish

granted but you no longer exist

i wish i had a planetary anihalation wallpaper and gamma edition soundtrack

garneted. no PA wishes can be corrupted because PA is awesome.

I wish that I could throw more money at star citizen and not run out and not die before it comes out.

granted. you throw the money of your entire live savings and you go bankrupt.

I wish that I could get a hoverboard soon.

Granted. It crashes and you are killed.

I want KSP 1.0 to come out earlier than the end of 2015.

Granted. The devs get tired of listening to people complain and rebadge 0.90 as 1.0 and stop development.

I wish for everyone to get their wish, without corruption or harming anyone else.

Granted.

Ha! You thought I would come up with some horrible corruption! Well I DIDN'T. You wanted a funny corruption, but you wish will forever go UNCORRUPTED, causing you mild annoyance that will quickly vanish within a few seconds of reading this post. MWAHAHAHAHAHAH!!!!!!

I wish for a cure for writers' block.

granted. you get a rock of writers in it.

I wish for a train that can go invisible.

Granted it collided with another train that didn't see it.

I wish I was invulnerable.
